translation-text.3: Add your new translated file to <a1>this directory</a1> with name: main_<a2>$langCode</a2>.arb
translation-text.4: Either email me: <mailto>manerakai@protonmail.com</mailto>, or a pull request.
icon-text: It's for the original SimplyTranslate project. The designer is joelchrono12.
